board

Class AbstractPiece<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.AbstractPiece<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic Type (any valid object)
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigDecimalPiece, BigIntegerPiece, BooleanPiece, CharPiece, DoublePiece, GamePiece, IntPiece, StringPiece

    public abstract class AbstractPiece<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract piece class to compliment the abstract board class. This class is adds two index properties to a given object for easy access in the AbstractBoard object
